Text: Thanks for this!  If it is possible... any chance that you can repost the other 20 to this series?  I never knew about ZCult until it went "down" and I searched the Bay for others in this series but couldn't find anything.
I second that request.  If anyone has any Marvel horror/monster comics they could share, i'd really appreciate it.

Thanks dimlan!

Would it be possible to put up disk 20 v2.0 (as you did with disk 74), as it was pulled from ZCult before everyone got it I think?

Either way, thanks for all your efforts.
